LanguageData.WNA_Dawnbreaker.label: "dawnbreaker" nuclear cannon
LanguageData.WNA_Dawnbreaker.description: A individual mortar cannon powered by a vitalized uranium battery, equipped with a special warhead, not effective against buildings, but can release special infectious radiation field over a wide area. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_Dawnbreaker.tools.rapier.label: rapier
LanguageData.WNA_Dawnbreaker.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: "dawnbreaker" nuclear cannon
LanguageData.WNA_Dawnbreaker_Proj.label: gun proj
LanguageData.WNA_HowlstormArti.label: "howlstorm" artillary
LanguageData.WNA_HowlstormArti.description: Iron guardians carries the task of guarding vital outposts, and they do have proper weapons for their responsibility. The "howlstorm" individual artillary can perform very-long-range attacks, its shell can use a shockwave to stun its targets, and release several beacons around where it explodes. The beacons will connect to WNA's Chimingblaze Celestrike Satellite Network to summon a catastrophic orbital strike at where they are. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_HowlstormArti.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.WNA_HowlstormArti.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: "howlstorm" artillary
LanguageData.WNA_HowlstormArti_Proj.label: gun proj
LanguageData.WNA_HowlstormHMG.label: "howlstorm" HMG
LanguageData.WNA_HowlstormHMG.description: Iron guardians carries the task of guarding vital outposts, and they do have proper weapons for their responsibility. The "howlstorm" HMG is one of the heaviest yet most awe-inspiring weapon in WNA conventional arsenal. It can cast a rain of thought-kinetic pulses over enemies with almost no breaks, and if someone is lucky enough to get close enough, then this weapon with astonishing size and weight will easily crush the lucky one into something just as mashed potato. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_HowlstormHMG.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.WNA_HowlstormHMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: "howlstorm" HMG
LanguageData.WNA_HowlstormHMG_Proj.label: gun proj
LanguageData.WNA_HowlstormMLRS.label: "howlstorm" MLRS
LanguageData.WNA_HowlstormMLRS.description: Iron guardians carries the task of guarding vital outposts, and they do have proper weapons for their responsibility. The "howlstorm" HMG is one of the heaviest yet most awe-inspiring weapon in WNA conventional arsenal. It can cast a rain of thought-kinetic pulses over enemies with almost no breaks, and if someone is lucky enough to get close enough, then this weapon with astonishing size and weight will easily crush the lucky one into something just as mashed potato. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_HowlstormMLRS.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.WNA_HowlstormMLRS.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: "howlstorm" MLRS
LanguageData.WNA_HowlstormMLRS_Proj.label: gun proj
LanguageData.WNA_IonizingRifle.label: ionizing rifle
LanguageData.WNA_IonizingRifle.description: a beam rifle powered by an unstable-particle emitter, this rifle can generate powerful focused radiation beam to damage it's target, though weak against buildings, this weapon is unusually effective against living enemies. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_IonizingRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.WNA_IonizingRifle_Proj.label: gun proj
LanguageData.WNA_Ironflower.label: "the ironflower"
LanguageData.WNA_Ironflower.description: the deadly "ironflower" siege cannon. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_Ironflower.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.WNA_Ironflower_Proj.label: gun proj
LanguageData.WNA_KineticCoil.label: kinetic coil
LanguageData.WNA_KineticCoil.description: Since darknight commandos often perform various kinds of infiltration missions and often fall into a lack of arsenal supplies, weapons boosted by thought-kinetic techniques are widely used by them. This "kinetic coil" is capable of converting the most aggressive thoughts into destructive enegy pulses, as powerful as normal bullets and travels far more faster. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_KineticCoil.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.WNA_KineticCoil_Proj.label: gun proj
LanguageData.WNA_KineticRailgun.label: kinetic railgun
LanguageData.WNA_KineticRailgun.description: This weapon is heavy and slow, but is capable to launch an extremely destructive shell, vaporize a large area, as well as buildings and enemies in it. A unique technique is applied to this weapon, which can convert thoughts into energy to boost the power of this weapon. Currently only WNA is known to own such technique. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_KineticRailgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.WNA_KineticRailgun_Proj.label: gun proj
LanguageData.WNA_LeadHazeARifle.label: "lead haze" assault rifle
LanguageData.WNA_LeadHazeARifle.description: A weapon suitable for short-range battle. This gun can dump a large amount of toxic bullets in a short period of time, very fine for street fighting. In countless past battles, WNA saboteurs have used this gun to dismantle countless steel-like solid fortresses from within. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_LeadHazeARifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.WNA_LeadHazeARifle_Proj.label: gun proj
LanguageData.WNA_LysisRifle.label: lysis rifle
LanguageData.WNA_LysisRifle.description: one of the most dreadful weapons invented by whelingnorther military. this weapon can shoot a beam of what called "lysis field", which can weaken the internal interaction of almost anything known, making them extremely fragile, and release a burst of lysis field when they finally break apart. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_LysisRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.WNA_LysisRifle_Proj.label: gun proj
LanguageData.WNA_NeutronRifle.label: neutron rifle
LanguageData.WNA_NeutronRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.WNA_NeutronRifle_Proj.label: gun proj
LanguageData.WNA_Permafrost.label: permafrost rifle
LanguageData.WNA_Permafrost.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.WNA_Permafrost_Proj.label: gun proj
LanguageData.WNA_Saber.label: whelingnorther saber
LanguageData.WNA_Saber.description: A thick, heavy and sharp military melee weapon, capable of cutting through armor, breaching fortifications, or cleaving a person in half. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_Saber.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.WNA_SpikeTrap.label: spike trap
LanguageData.WNA_SpikeTrap.description: Several blades half-burried underground with a set of specially designed trigger. If some careless person steps on it, the blades will teach this person an unforgettable lesson - sometimes a last lesson in their life. The heavier this trap is, the more deadly it is. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_SpikeTrapSpawned.label: spike trap deployed
LanguageData.WNA_SpikeTrapSpawned.description: Several blades half-burried underground with a set of specially designed trigger. If some careless person steps on it, the blades will teach this person an unforgettable lesson - sometimes a last lesson in their life. The heavier this trap is, the more deadly it is. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_SunsetArtillery.label: "sunset" sniper artillery mode
LanguageData.WNA_SunsetArtillery.description: sunset sniper rifle switched to mortar mode, usually used with smaller-sized antigrain warheads. a single rail can lead shells through proper path, go a long distance and hit target. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_SunsetArtillery.tools.rapier.label: rapier
LanguageData.WNA_SunsetArtillery_Proj.label: gun proj
LanguageData.WNA_SunsetSniper.label: "sunset" sniper rifle
LanguageData.WNA_SunsetSniper.description: A sniper rifle with advanced sights, capable of killing enemies at quite a distance. Its hollow-point bullets can deal a great amount of damage, one can hardly escape its attack. Even if the lucky few managed to survive, they will suffer from massive trauma and the almost inevitable infection. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_SunsetSniper.tools.rapier.label: rapier
LanguageData.WNA_SunsetSniper.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: "sunset" sniper rifle
LanguageData.WNA_SunsetSniper_Proj.label: gun proj
LanguageData.WNA_TrapLauncher.label: spike trap launcher
LanguageData.WNA_TrapLauncher.description: A heavy individual artillery, not designed for directly blasting enemies, but for deploying traps. Its projectile does little harm to its targets, but deploys spike traps in an area. These spike traps are very dangerous. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_TrapLauncher.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.WNA_TrapLauncher.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: spike trap launcher
LanguageData.WNA_TrapLauncher_Proj.label: gun proj
LanguageData.WNA_Weapon_RiteLance.label: whelingnorther rite lance
LanguageData.WNA_Weapon_RiteLance.description: A lance with unique shape, embued with otherworldly power. Such weapon is often used for ceremonial purposes, but it also has superior power as a weapon. Its flame is so violent that any wound it inflicts usually results in the immediate death of the victim. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_Weapon_RiteLance.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.WNA_Weapon_RiteSword.label: whelingnorther rite sword
LanguageData.WNA_Weapon_RiteSword.description: A longsword with unique shape, embued with otherworldly power. Such weapon is often used for ceremonial purposes, but it also has superior power as a weapon. Its flame is so violent that any wound it inflicts usually results in the immediate death of the victim. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_Weapon_RiteSword.tools.edge.label: edge
